statements: DELETE FROM recidivism_data WHERE participant_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM recidivism_data WHERE id = 1 AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM recidivism_data WHERE recidivism_status = true AND participant_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM reentry_programs WHERE success_rate < 0.5 AND end_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM InmateActivities WHERE activity_type LIKE '%Exercise%';
DELETE FROM inmate_history WHERE completion_status = FALSE;
DELETE FROM inmates WHERE sentence_end_date IS NULL;
DELETE FROM inamte_history WHERE completion_status = false;
